analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/26/0x39f55974b40179ba7e14bf5d11975c185876c1fa.sol:
	Contract IVNT2Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x39f55974b40179ba7e14bf5d11975c185876c1fa.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0x39f55974b40179ba7e14bf5d11975c185876c1fa.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/26/0x39f55974b40179ba7e14bf5d11975c185876c1fa.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/26/0x39f55974b40179ba7e14bf5d11975c185876c1fa.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of IVNT2Token.burn (/unique_chucks/26/0x39f55974b40179ba7e14bf5d11975c185876c1fa.sol#232) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of IVNT2Token.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/26/0x39f55974b40179ba7e14bf5d11975c185876c1fa.sol#248) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of IVNT2Token.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/26/0x39f55974b40179ba7e14bf5d11975c185876c1fa.sol#248) is not in mixedCase
